features: WHIPPED LIGHTWEIGHT FORMULA - Formulated with enriched Virgin Coconut, Avocado, Shea, Mango and Cocoa Butters, our Whipped Shave Crème has been carefully designed to provide a more comfortable experience and help you avoid pesky nicks, cuts and razor burn.

NO FOAM, NO MESS - Unlike traditional creams and gels, our Whipped Shave Crème doesn’t foam up and obscure the area you’re about to take the razor too. Instead, the butter is non-greasy and gives you a smooth, luxurious feel both before and, if you’d like, after the shave.

PERFECT FOR ALL SKIN AND HAIR TYPES - Whether you’ve got dry or sensitive skin, coarse or fine hair, this Butter will give you as smooth and irritation-free a shave as the next one. It’s even great for women who like having their skin bump and blemish free after shaving as well.

LUXURY AT EVERYDAY PRICES – Save your precious dollar for other luxuries in life. We strive to provide the best price possible to give you that smooth, luxurious feel without having to break the bank like with other luxury skin care products.
OUR GUARANTEE TO YOU - Give this Butter a try, and if it’s not for you, let us know anytime within 3 months and we’ll refund 100% of your purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5 reasons to try Whipped Shave Creme Creamy shave prep whipped to perfectionGlides onto skin to protect & nourishSlick formula for smooth razor glideHydrates with nourishing buttersA superb shave with no razor clog

Van Der Hagen Array of Products Pre-Shave Use pre-shave oil to lock moisture into your skin and create a slick, lubricated surface that your blade passes over easily. Shave Our safety razor ensures you get the right angle every time for a smooth, precise shave that won’t tug at your beard or irritate your skin. Post Shave Non-greasy soothing balm cools and calms freshly shaved skin, leaving it slick, moisturized, and smelling great.

Make it part of your daily routine Rinse For smoothest results, make it part of your daily routine. Shave Everyday for 30 days to see the difference. Skin Care After shaving, massage into your skin as a moisturizing lotion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my picky husband
reviews.reviewText: My husband has very thick hair follicles on his neck and shaving can be quite a painful experience for him and his sensitive skin. He has been using this for over 1 month now and has not broken out or had any reaction. Less bleeding post shave. Smells wonderful. Feels smooth and moisturized post shave. I even swiped it a few times for my legs and loved it. He will be a user for life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Van Der Hagen Shaving Cream
reviews.reviewText: This cream is a well-made product that moisturizes the skin and does result in a slick, smooth shave with an additional layer of a residual top layer surface while shaving. The noticeable detail about this product is that it was not made with the same butternut oil scent similar to their other products, and smells more like a chemical hair product that would be used at a salon with no aroma. However, this is an excellent cream for shaving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love Van Der Hagen Stuff ! Great Moisture & Smooth Shave!
reviews.reviewText: Very creamy and moisturizing, I have many of their products! Top Quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works as it should
reviews.reviewText: It works well, I get a clean shave. Too bad the first order never arrived, said it was delovered but never saw it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not purchase this product
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited to try this product. I had a beard and was only shaving my cheeks and the bottom of my neck. I first tried it using a shaving brush which was not the way to go. It would not generate a lather and the brush was difficult to clean. The next day I decided to cut my beard off with clippers and then tried the cream again, this time wetting my face with hot water and applying it with my fingers. I used a lot more of it this time and found it to be a terrible shaving experience. I found the product to be more like cold cream than shaving cream. It was very greasy and clogged up my razor to the extent that I had to replace the blade (it was brand new). This product is so bad, that I will not use it again as I have already tossed it in the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to foamy shave cream
reviews.reviewText: I have tried alternatives to foamy shave cream for years. Nothing worked as good until I found whipped shave cream. It’s still not as thick but works really well for a better alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A close shave.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the cream because it made the razor glide on my face. One drawback was, it was ice cold on my face. I tried using a shaving brush with hot water, but the cream was to thick. It is also very hard to wash off your hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Have to use to much to shave :
